name: Office Day!
description:
Welcome To Office Day!

You play a simple office worker, who has little love for his job. However, things get strange as you approach the end of the day, and soon you find yourself trying to complete the most important task at your company!

CREDITS:

  • Programming & Writing: Apollopower
  • Level Design: Tyna01
  • Pixel Art: LimeZu - itch.io
